Microsoft Windows XP Pro Media Center Edition 2005 VLK [H33T] [Foo]

This is the Ultimate release and I would recommend it to my mother if she knew how to use a computer.
But enough about the intro, let me get on to the details that many of you may be asking "why is this release so special?"

Starting off: These are untouched and there are no extra slipstreamed programs.
You can be assured that your system will not be bloated with unneeded programs.

This version of Windows XP Pro will not ask you to activate.
It is a copy used in many colleges to teach students the installtion process of Windows XP.
It is, however, a full version of XP, and it has all the extras Windows XP is known to have.
This release will also allow you to log on to Microsoft.com and use Windows Update with no problem.
The CD is expected to be copied multiple times.
I hope you all enjoy this release and hopefully its the last release you will ever have to download.

This Release is by far the greatest XP you&#039;ll ever use.
Do not take my word for it folks. You MUST try it for yourselves.
It&#039;s faster than any other XP out there right now.

Greatest feature of all: NO MORE WGA KILLERS OR CRACKS.
When you&#039;re updating from Windows update or Microsoft Update and you are prompted to install the WGA notification tool.
GO AHEAD! your system is valid and fully updatable.

This release is fully legit and Microsoft cant do a damn thing to hurt it.
